# Introduction

The purpose of this practical is to get you familiar with visualising SNV calls in IGV, and to assess whether they are genuine calls or technical artefacts. 

## Preparation

- Load the Tumour `.bam` file `/home/participant/Course_Materials/data/cell-line/HCC1143.mix1.n20t80.reheader.bam`
- Load the Normal `.bam` file `/home/participant/Course_Materials/data/cell-line/HCC1143.NORMAL.30x.compare.reheader.bam`
- Load the `.vcf` file containing variants called by Caveman for this tumour /normal pair `/home/participant/Course_Materials/Day3/HCC1143_vs_HCC1143_BL.flagged.muts.vcf`
